section.name: Download AndroMDA Development Maven Plugin
section.p: The fastest way to get started developing AndroMDA plugins is by installing the AndroMDA Development Maven Plugin.

To download and install the plugin into your maven plugin repository, first make sure you are pointing to the AndroMDA team server in your maven.repo.remote property (i.e. maven.repo.remote=http://www.ibiblio.org/maven,http://team.andromda.org/maven). Then type:
maven plugin:download -DgroupId=andromda -DartifactId=maven-androdev-plugin -Dversion=3.0M2-SNAPSHOT
